title: Liar! Liar? RIP Wine 1.17.20
itunes:title: Liar! Liar? RIP Wine 1.17.20
description:
In episode 551, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Kyle Ayers to discuss Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders' exchange after the Democratic debates, the classic 'I was joking about murder' defense, the DOJ clearing Hillary Clinton in Uranium investigation, an Aunt Becky update, wine consumption dropping, M. Night Shyamalan being accused of plagiarism again, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Exclusive: Warren accused Sanders in tense post-debate exchange of calling her a 'liar' on national TV
  2. ROBERT HYDE SAYS HE WAS ONLY 'PLAYING' IN TEXTS ABOUT SURVEILLANCE OF MARIE YOVANOVITCH
  3. Ukraine launches criminal investigation into alleged threats against former US Ambassador Marie Yovanovitch
  4. FBI investigators visit Robert Hyde's home and office
  5. Justice Dept. winds down Clinton-related inquiry once championed by Trump. It found nothing of consequence.
  6. Things Aren't Looking Too Hot for Aunt Becky and Her Husband
  7. Americans' wine consumption dropped for the first time in 25 years
  8. The Filmmaker Who Says M. Night Shyamalan Stole Her Movie
  9. Author Says New Film Is Similar to Her Novel
  10. Author mulls lawsuit over ''The Village''
  11. 'The Sixth Sense' Ripped Off An 'Are You Afraid of the Dark' Episode & Here's the Proof
  12. WATCH: MonoNeon - "Hot Cheetos" [Official Music Video]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
